_version.description: Application attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

sourceTemplate.description: Represents the template from which the app was generated

id.description: Represents id of the template from which the app was generated

version.description: Represents the version of the template from which the app was generated

id.description: Represents mandatory unique app identifier which must correspond to component 'id/namespace'

type.description: Represents type of an application and can be application or component or library

i18n.description: Represents path inside the app to the properties file containing text symbols for the Descriptor

embeds.description: Represents array of relative paths to the nested manifest.json's (mandatory if it contains nested 'manifest.json')

embeddedBy.description: Represents relative path back to the manifest.json of an embedding component or library (mandatory for nested 'manifest.json')

dataSources.description: Represents used data sources with a unique key/alias

cdsViews.description: Represents array of directly used CDS views, which only to be added if directly used via INA protocol and not if used via OData service

resources.description: Represents reference to a file (naming convention is resources.json) which contains list with all resources which the app needs

offline.description: Represents indicator whether the app is running offline. Possible values are true or false (default)

uri.description: Represents uri of the data source

type.description: Represents type of the data source. The supported types are OData, ODataAnnotation, INA, XML, JSON

settings.description: Represents data source type specific attributes (key, value pairs)

odataVersion.description: Represents version of OData: 2.0 is default

localUri.description: Represents path to local meta data document or annotation uri

annotations.description: Represents  array of annotation which references an existing data source of type ODataAnnotation
